  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent​(java.lang.Long _id, java.lang.String _serialNumber, java.lang.String _name, int _group) throws ValidatorException
      The method adds a student with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the student which is to be added
      _serialNumber - the serial number of the student which is to be added
      _name - the name of the student which is to be added
      _group - the group of the student which is to be added
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the given attributes are invalid

    • getAllStudents

      public java.util.Set<Student> getAllStudents()
      The method collects all the students in a Set.
      Returns:
      a Set containing all students in the repository

    • filterStudentsByName

      public java.util.Set<Student> filterStudentsByName​(java.lang.String _substring)
      The method returns all students whose name contain the given string.
      Parameters:
      _substring - the string that it is looked for in the names
      Returns:
      a Set of students whose names contain the string _substring

    • filterStudentsBySerialNumber

      public java.util.Set<Student> filterStudentsBySerialNumber​(java.lang.String _substring)
      The method returns all students whose serial number contain the given string.
      Parameters:
      _substring - the string it is looked for in the serial numbers
      Returns:
      a Set of students whose serial numbers contain the string _substring

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent​(java.lang.Long _id) throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
      The method deletes the student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the student that will be deleted
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the given id does not correspond to any student

    • updateStudent

      public void updateStudent​(java.lang.Long _id, java.lang.String _newSerialNumber, java.lang.String _newName, int _newGroup) throws java.lang.Exception
      The method updates a student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the student what will be updated
      _newSerialNumber - the new serial number of the updated student
      _newName - the new name of the updated student
      _newGroup - the new group of the updated student
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if either the student with the given id does not exist or the new attributes are not valid

    • findStudent

      public java.util.Optional<Student> findStudent​(java.lang.Long id)
      This method returns the student with the id equal to the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student that is looked for
      Returns:
      an Optional, the student if it exists, null if not
